main event: A glowing object was observed over Pepperrell A.F.B., Newfoundland for approximately 12 minutes.
interesting points: The object was reported to be moving in small circles,The object was described as having a triangular shape, blue-white in color, and approximately 20-25 feet wide,There was radar confirmation of the object,Two other persons had also observed a similar object one hour prior to the sighting,The conclusion was inconclusive regarding the nature of the object.
witness description: Observers appeared to be responsible and accurate reporters of the incident.
